Module core.java.helper
Package com.pineframework.core.helper

Class I18nUtils

java.lang.Object
com.pineframework.core.helper.I18nUtils
public final class I18nUtils extends Object
The I18nUtils class provides utility functions for internationalization.
  • i18n(String, Object...)
  • i18nByBundle(String, String, Object...)
  • i18ns(String, String, Object[][])

  • Field Details

    • I18N_LOCALE

      public static final String I18N_LOCALE
      The language of locale in two letters format. en_US fa_IR
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • I18N_FILES

      public static final String I18N_FILES
      The files in order to handle multiple internationalization file.

      The files should be write as a comma separate string.

      test_i18n1,test_i18n2,...
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • i18ns

      public static String[] i18ns(String key, String splitter, Object[][] params)
      The i18ns method gets message from bundles as an array.
      Parameters:
      key - message key
      splitter - to distinguish the elements of array
      Returns:
      String[], messages
